name: Spear That Fish!
description:
English:

"Spear that Fish!" is an arcade game where the players will be playing as a fishing boat that has a spear under it. Players are given the task to catch fish among the plastic waste within a certain amount of time to clear the stages.

Indonesia:

Game berjudul "Spear that Fish!" yang dibuat dengan genre ARCADE. Di dalam game ini, player akan bermain menggunakan kapal pancing yang memiliki tombak di bawahnya. Player diminta untuk menangkap ikan-ikan di antara sampah plastik untuk mencapai skor goal.
